titleStmt.title: Considerations by way of sober queries, whether the state and condition of the three nations have been, or may be bettered, or made far worse, by the sitting, and acting of the remnant of the Old Parliament, without a free and full assembly, chosen by the consent and election of the people, which are most concerned therein. / By Tho. Le White Esq;
titleStmt.author: Le White, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "feb: 20. 1659."; the 60 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
